attributes.action: abolish the act of handshaking and instead replace it with a mandatory high-five.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hand-shaking spreads germs, as well as annoying people who have just clenched the clammy limp hand of some pathetic individuals. High-fives will increase morale, reduce germ transfer, and make people generally look cool. Low-fives are also permitted, but "down below you're too slow" will be frowned upon.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
